ISSUE.TITLE: "From [price]" issue with tier prices (when higher qty has higher price)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Althought could be "fixed" by adding a tier price record with "highest quantity" for overriden customer role price Also note that such scenarios are VERY rate (when a higher qty has higher price) Forum source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/28478/tier-pricing-override-bug-320.aspx

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #708 Properly calculating a minimum price for products with tier prices
